/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is filled with cars and pedestrians, adding a dynamic element to the image. The buildings on either side of the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. In the background, construction cranes can be seen, indicating ongoing development and growth in the area.
